document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi won a closely watched test of his strength in parliament on tuesday, a day ahead of his trial on charges of paying for sex with an underage teenager.
document.title: berlusconi boosted by vote ahead of ruby trial
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi won a closely watched test of his strength in parliament on tuesday, a day ahead of his trial on charges of paying for sex with an underage teenager.
